Caption: Additional Information and Endnotes
BottomBlockText:
Transfer funds, pay bills, earn credit card rewards and more. Learn more about the Cash Management Account by calling 1-800-SAMPLE or visit 
samplecompany.com/cashmanagement 

The SampleCompany Portfolio Advisory Service account offers professional money management and access to our proprietary research through model portfolios of mutual funds. Get a complimentary investment proposal by calling SampleCompany at 800-123-4567.

TableNotes.Value: Includes transfers between Sample Company accounts.
Appreciation or depreciation of your holdings due to price changes plus any distribution and income earned during the statement period.
